Details: Halem - Paken | As reported by Water Resources Gohpur, mild erosion observed at Paken area on R/B of river Brahmaputra on 12/06/2022. Length 1400m | 0

Bagribari - Village Jongirkilla Pt-I & Jongirkilla Pt-II | as per report collected from Bagribari Rev. Circle Due to heavy rainfall a JFMC embankment of Community Tank at village Jongirkill Pt-II has been breached and the water merged to a steam and suddenly a speed flow of water come towards the village and erosion has been occurred. As a result, Population affected= 105 Nos. House- 2nos. partially affected with household properties, Pond- 10 nos. eroded, Life Stock washed away Small (Goat)-01 no. Poultry= 40 nos., Crop (Summer Paddy) affected = Area: 3.5 Hector, families displaced 02 and 01 shifted to shelter camp on- 12.06.2022 | 105
